title: 30-Day Follow-Up Survey
description: Help us understand your progress 30 days after completing the AI training course.

questions.question: Have you started implementing AI solutions in your work or projects?
How confident do you feel working with AI tools and technologies?
Which AI tools or platforms have you used since completing the course?
What challenges, if any, have you faced when trying to apply what you learned?
questions.placeholder: Describe any obstacles or difficulties you've encountered...

questions.question: Which aspect of the course has been most valuable to you so far?
How likely are you to recommend this course to a colleague?
What additional support or resources would help you succeed with AI?
questions.placeholder: Share your thoughts on what would be helpful...
